title: cmd/gc: misdiagnosis of unsafe.Pointer with -u
body:
by **vladimir.webdev**: 
When I upload app that uses gocheck to the GAE using appcfg.py I see following error:

03:34 PM Error 422: --- begin server output ---
Compile failed:
2012/09/14 05:34:04 go-app-builder: Failed building app: failed running 6g: exit status 1


launchpad.net/gocheck/benchmark.go:1: cannot use unsafe.Pointer
launchpad.net/gocheck/benchmark.go:1: too many errors
--- end server output ---

although it looks that gocheck does not import unsafe anywhere.
